reviews.review:
Playing trapper in dead before daylight is like being a disappointed dad "Come on now Dwight, you knew that was gonna happen. Up and at 'em, back to the hook with you."

"Now Meg, how many times have I told you not to climb around on the windows? I said there were bear traps but did you listen? Think about it while you're in time out."

Once I started getting good enough to beat the window-cheesers and unhookers the salt went away, now I just feel this paternal, "I told you so" disappointment. It's a weird feeling I've never seen in a game before. When I catch you trying some bullshit you should've known wouldn't work I just shake my head and carry you off to time out.

This all happens because you keep staying at Uncle Wraith's house. He lets you do anything you want. But here at Trapper Dad's house we run a tight ship.

Experianced fathers will be great at this game.

Наиграл я в неё на момент написания 5,5 часов.
Из минусов
- Русского интерфейса на 24.05.2016 нет
- Маньяк странно ходит (летает прямо таки), кривая анимация ходьбы, что крайне не круто смотрится со стороны (когда ты смотришь на него из кустов :) чтоб не покоцал)
- Нет толкового обучения, почти всё сам по ходу изучаешь (в начале кратко покажут основу)
- Управление не меняется ни разу. Как кнопки забиты, так и будут. Использую Key Remapper
- Графика слабая, про ходу U3, не настраивается доп опциями
- Тебя будут убивать первым по началу тк ты не умеешь играть
- Исключительно кооператив с живыми людьми, нет локальной игры, чтоб потренироваться с ботами
- После 5 часов игры страх уходит что был в начале
- Инди составляющая так и прёт из всех щелей. Не доделанная (анимация, графика и тд)
- Нельзя убить маньяка и дать ему пинка (по началу уж точно)
- Маньячилла бегает быстрее тебя, так что от него удрать можно только в 15% случая (спрятавшись, если повезёт), а если ранен, то убежать шансов - 5-10%.. или меньше. Я пару раз смог... :)

Их плюсов
- Первые часа 2-3 ты будешь обсираться от страха и стресса, тк играть-то ты не умеешь! А это то, ради чего в неё играю! И это главный и единственный плюс - атмосфера страха и безисходности! :))

Ни разу не играл за маньяка, тк за выжившими и так оч весело убегать от него!
Маньяка можно в лицо осветить фонариком, он затупливает чутка, можно взять карту (заработать) которая показывает не долго где какие фонари врубить

Каждый из 4х персонажей прокачивается отдельно. Пока не очень понял то дерево навыков (и можно брать ништяки что открыл, только разок, потом испаряются), тк всё на инглише. Смог убежать - 5000 баллов, плюс зарабатываешь включая прожекторы. На эту "бабосы" уже и прокачиваешься.

Не смотря на минусы, которые ты обходишь и привыкаешь со временем, они уже не так критичны и не бросаются в глаза так сильно (ну кроме ходьбы маньяка, он пипец как криво анимирован, прямо таки Майкл Джексон с лунной походной, только вперёд? а не назад :). Игра просто мастхев для тех кто хочет пощекотать нервы, поймать тазик адреналина, сердце поныкать в пятки и отлично устрашиться!

Атмосфера - 15 из 10
Реализация остального 6 из 10 (жёсткое инди)

Крайне рекомендую попугаться!

PS Сперва на ночь я зассал играть, по сему играл на след день, днём :)))))))))))) Та же фигня была когда ещё Left4Dead вышел - боялся зомби и играть в неё. Там можно их убивать, а вот маньяка нельзя убить или покоцать (поранить) :( !
I Like This Game And The Concept Of It ,But The Wait Time In Lobbies If You're A Kill Is Too Long And If Someone Joins They'll Leave. If This Was Approved On It Would Be My New Favorite Game

萌新刚玩了大概十几局，气氛的确是慌得一笔，不过这个游戏真是让我觉得人间有真情人间有真爱QAQ玩到一局自己被挂树了，夹子哥还在底下放了个夹子，然后就在旁边蹲点。本来觉得自己大概没救了就干脆不动拖时间，没想到一个双马尾绕到屠夫背后的障碍物那里一直很耐心等屠夫走再把我放下来……虽然还没被放下来双马尾自己也被锤了，然后我们两只萌新双双挂树…………不过每次看到队友摸过来救我的时候真的蛮感动的……QAQ现在摸索技巧中

Play as killer = OP if you're on even ground. If the survivors are a few levels/ranks above you forget it.
Play as survivor = horseshit if the killer is a few ranks above you/levels. 
Matching is complete trash. Oh look, I'm rank 19 killer and I'm paired with 4 survivors at rank 19, 8, 3, and 1. How is this balanced? They get 3-4 generators up before you can even set one trap. Fuck this.
I love this game but I dont have 5 friends. Why dosnt this game have a onlineparty system so 2 people can play together or at least get in the same lobby? Over all fun game.

Dead by Daylight — это, когда при запуске игры, лагает трейлер.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда тебе не хватает милиметра, чтобы освободится.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда ты помогаешь человеку, потом он тебе мешает спастись.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда долгие ожидания игры за маньяка, а за выжившего находит за 5 секунд.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда ты нажимаешь войти в лобби, а тебя закидывает обратно в меню.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда ты прыгаешь в люк, тебя обязательно вытащит маньяк.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда ты спасаешь всю тиму и делаешь генераторы, и потом тебя повесил маньяк, все просто убегают наплевав на тебя.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда баги могут спасти тебе жизнь, а иногда нет.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда ты забаговался и летаешь, решил спрятаться в шкафу, но твоя голова торчит, ПОТОМУ ЧТО ТЫ ЛЕТАЕШЬ.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда ты хочешь сыграть с друзьями, но там нету совместного лобби.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда вы с другом ищите друг друга на 1 2 3.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда нельзя доверять своим сокомандникам.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда ты не можешь обойтись без троллинга маньяка, когда уже двери открыты.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда ты купил делюкс издание, но толку от него нет, кроме 3 ключей для БЕТЫ.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда ты думаешь, что в релизе всё будет лучше, да это становится лучше, но добавляется куча багов.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда ты хочешь играть в эту игру и хочешь.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда тебе плевать на баги(почти), но главное гемплей и атмосфера.
Dead by Daylight — это, когда малобюджетный проект лучше Пятницы 13.
Dead by Daylight deluxe edition — это, когда ты не получаешь свой саунтрек и арт книжку. :c
Dead by Daylight — это, когда маньяк невидимка убивает всю твою команду, а вы даже не запустили ни один генератор.

All this game needs is party play! Otherwise, I really think this game is awesome and unique!

8/10

nur private spiele sucken ;(
sonst gutes spiel...
The game is really fun, but I think that it needs a party system. You should buy it. ^_^

Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяк (школьник,нубас или просто урод) не смог никого убить и что бы испортить всем игру нажимает ALT+F4,всех выкидывает.И прогресс никому не засчитывается.
Dead by Daylight - это когда, нажимаешь 5-10 раз на поиск игры, а поиск все время фейлится.
Dead by Daylight - это когда, что бы поиграть с другом не в лобби,ты должен еще поиграть в игру "ОДИН","ДВА","ТРИ".
Dead by Daylight - это когда, идиоты умирают пытаясь слезть с крюка.
Dead by Daylight - это когда, ты остался один и маньяк ждет пока ты истечешь кровью, тратя свое и мое время.
Dead by Daylight - это хорошая, но недоработанная игра.
Если где-то грамматические,пунктуационные ошибки, то не серчайте на меня.
Спасибо за внимание!

Edit after another 1000 hours:

This game ended up being one of my favorite games. a game i always come back to just for some action.

Im glad i stuck to this game, the devs fixed most of the annoying stuff and made everything more fair. The game needs more content, and not just killers and survivors. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: This review is written before the "join with friends"-patch (if it will ever come.)

I'm not recommending this game in its current state (i have 57 hours played when i write this) even though its quite fun. There are too many cons, I dont even understand how this game can be released (with that i mean i can understand this game being an early access game, but 1.0 release? come on). 

As the killer; if a survivor disconnects when you put them in a dying state, and trust me, they will dc just because you got them in the first minute of a game, you will probably de-rank because you dont get enough bloodpoints (your exp) to rank up. There have been games that i de-ranked even though i killed 3 out of 4 survivors and had all 5 engines intact. 

This game punishes you for being good, if you kill the survivors fast enough you might not get all the bloodpoints needed for a rank up. That goes for the survivors as well, if your team is really good chances are that you will get a low amount of bloodpoints and thereby de-rank. 

I will probably continue play this game, but i really cant recommend it in its current state. If it would be an early access title i would probably recommend it because it has potential.
One of the best games out there.

Great game for what it's worth.  It is in it's infancy as a game, but it works fairly well.  Mechanics are fine, some balancing that needs to be done but that's under control I presume.  Match making needs to be fixed because people game hop and disconnect without penalty, 4 level 50 survivors with full perks shouldn't be taking on a level 1 killer, and vice versa.  Otherwise this is a great game if you like the horror suspense and survival.

Campers really ruin the experience for me. When the killer grabs you and puts you on the hook, it's practically impossible to be saved when they're standing there staring at you. And the length of time it takes to start the generator is much longer than the time you have on a hook, so saying "camping lets your team start generators faster" isn't a valid argument. Besides, if one person dies, the team is at a serious disadvantage the next time the killer decides to be a camper. It's unfortunate, because this game has an amazing concept. Killers just abuse the system.

Other than that, game is addicting and adrenaline pumping. Just needs better balance.

Good multiplayer game, but not good enough to be worth $20. This is more like a $5 game. Did I crap my pants? No.  Does this game have poor video options ? Yes. Also, what's up with the graphics, they seem like made in 5 min by a lowly paid graphic designer.

- Killer carries me to hatch

10/10 would rat out campers again

This will be my first review on Steam! After 50 hours of gameplay with this fun little gem, I would have to highly recommend this to anyone that is interested in horror and/or multiplayer oriented games. Firstly, let me say I knew nothing about this game until the day it came out, in which I looked at one gameplay video (thank you Steam Queue) and immediately bought the game. Dead by Daylight is a 4v1, meaning it has asymmetrical multiplayer. Four players work together as Survivors, while the lone player plays as a homicidal killer. The four survivors must work together in repairing generators, finding items, distracting and hiding from the killer, saving each other, and ultimately escaping the level. Whereas the killer has only one objective in mind: Hook the survivors to sacrifice them to the godly being only known as The Entity. With machete, hooked axe, or hammer in hand, they meticulously hunt down the survivors and strike them with painful weapons to bring them to a crawl. The game is a constant rush for both the killer and the survivor, and after 50 hours I still shake in my boots when trying to escape from a relentless killer.

Pros:
- Asymmetrical Multiplayer
- Very unique premise, only other game that is like it is Friday the 13th, which is not out yet
- Four unique survivors each with unique perks associated with said character
- Three unique killers, each with their own perks and special weapons specifically meant to kill survivors
- Unique leveling system that is procedurally generated, giving access to wide varieties of weapons, add-ons that augment the effects of said items, perks, and offerings a.k.a burn cards to slightly change how a match will be played out
- Levels are somewhat procedurally generated, being made randomly from tiles in a tileset.
- Prestige system for those who love to just keep going
- Always heart pumping for both sides of the field
- No two matches are the same
- Support from devs via livestreams and active updates, first update came out less than a week after release
- Will be supported with free and paid DLC

Cons:
- Somewhat buggy at times, my experience has only really seen massive framerate drop to the point where it is nearly unplayable, but it usually fixes itself. There are discussions about odd bugs in this game
- May be repetitive for some
- Late game progression is lackluster, prestige only gives different clothing that has blood, may not be worth it for some
- Currently there are tactics in the game that are frustrating for both sides, but this is an issue with any competitive game, cheap tactics will be found
- No party mode with friends CURRENTLY, it is being added soon
- Community has a noteworthy disconnecting issue, although this does not inherently make the game worse, since it is multiplayer based, this greatly affects one's experience with the game

Overall, I would have to say that Dead by Daylight is a great title for anyone looking to pick up something very unique. To me, it is endless hours of fun and excitement, and I have been a gamer for nearly 20 years. For only $20 dollars, this game is extremely worthwhile for its price. Buy this game now!
Cool
Simple Concept = Great fun
Good. Fun. Scary. Needs some more maps and maybe another game mode.

I will change my review once the problems have been addressed. But right now, waaaay too many problems. The game is was a blast at first, but here are some of the many issues I've run into:
-de-ranked due to disconnecters in the game despite having sufficient points to rank. not sure how this happens
-killer cant hope to rank up when people disconnect and will derank at the conclusion of a match due to not enough points being available because of lack of survivors
-as killer, I killed two people and then randomly tons of other players randomly spawn. The game crashed after I had gone through killing a couple dozen, unmoving people in a single match in a game meant only for 4. Happened three times in a row. I did not get anything for playing the match
-window hopper glitch where a survivor hops a window around a corner, but due to me being close I get stuck on the corner of the building. was forced to disconnect
-played two games where three survivors surrounded me in crouch as I was carrying someone and game wouldnt let me drop who I was carrying or hit the ones around me. Was funny at first, but people are starting to figure it out and it happened a bunch
-got stuck inside a pushed down pallet as survivor
-ran into a couple of level 3 survivors who were rank 1. Really?! Thats impossible. Most obvious hack I've ever seen. They didnt even try to hide it. You can't play enough matches at level 3 to reach rank 1 even if you go undefeated. 

These are some of the problems I faced and most of them are pretty much game-breaking. I will change my review once they are fixed, but this is just to warn people that I am one person and I experienced this many problems on my own. Caution with this purchase. It was fun until the game started breaking. Wait until fixes.

В каждой катке ливеры.

It's a fun enough game, but until the devs address and fix numerous issues it won't live up to its full potential. 

The matchmaking is garbage (perhaps the worst i've seen in a game yet),
There's NO way to communicate with other survivors once you are IN game (which is ridiculous, considering it's a TEAM BASED, CO-OP survival game),
There's numerous glitches that players can take advantage of giving them wayyyyy too much of an upper-hand,
Salty players who don't want a loss can simply disconnect - throwing off, sometimes entirely stopping the game (75% of my games end because the "killer" is losing...he leaves the game and that's that. Game over.),
Etc. Etc. Etc.

I was SUPER excited about this game. It's a great, fresh idea in the horror/survival genre....but she needs some work.
best -rep profile comment farming game

Only buy this game if you have atleast 3 other friends to play it with. In my opinion, playing on your own is not as fun as playing with friends. I would re-consider the game if they allow you to get XP from private matches with friends, or queueing up with friends in a real game. Otherwise, I wouldn't recommend this game.

This Game The Dead by Daylight Really Good I Like it

It will frustrate you, anger you and get your blood pumping (either inside your body as part of normal bodily function or, pumping out of it).

Similar to Evolve, with the exception of a human/mutant predator who you can't kill. Reminiscent of Manhunt I suppose.

Significant downsides (IMHO) which are the reason for not recommending it at this time are related to the current matchmaking and lobby system:
1. It fails attempting to join lobbies frequently
2. Private matches (where you gain no progression) is the only way (short of jumping out of public lobbies and joining again and hoping you join the right one) of playing a few rounds with your friends
3. You can't set your private match to public (related to Point 2)

Once the above is resolved in a future update, I can recommend this.

I would like to start this review off by giving my overall experience, then i will go into further detail. So that this review can be as helpful as possible.

Overall Score : 8/10 - Fun experience as both survivor and killer, but does have some flaws.
Looks of game : 8/10 - It doesn't have the best graphics, but it really doesnt need to (will go into this more later)
Playing as Survivor : 9/10 - easy to learn how to control, easy objectives, overall fun.
Playing as Killer : 9/10 - this is my favorite, it is a little harder to figure out, but once you do, so much fun
Other Players currently: anywhere from a 5/10 - 10/10 ; this one is hard, because you can have 5 matches in a row with people that don't disconnect, don't hop windows, etc. or it can happen every match you play in one day.

I will now try to break this down the best I can, Also this review is the game state of patch 1.0.1, any changes in the game will not be reflected in my review.

Starting with my least high score : Other Players
As of patch 1.0.1 there sadly is a large amount of players that are taking advantage of some design flaws in the infrastructure of the game. 
Here is a list so you know what to expect:
1 - If you are playing a game and don't like what is happening, you can alt f4 out or disconnect your internet, this causes you to leave the game and not lose any addons, perks, and your rank. (Rank is number one reason people leave a match)

2 - because of problem #1 it ruins the game for not just killers but survivors a like, If you are playing killers your chances of ranking up has diminished and same with survivors - so to fix this players have been quiting lobbies as soon as a low rank is seen, causing grief for the players that actually earned their rank.

3 - window hopping: I personally have no problem with this, but it is discussed in the forums as a problem area for some.

4- one problem that players have also caused is the killers camping, once again it does not bother me, but others see it as a problem.

That is all of the problems that I have read about or encountered on my own. Sadly it is not the game's fault but because of people being people, the Devs will have to work on this, and it sounds like they are.

Playing as the Killer: 
Fun, exciting. Imagine that your playing hide and seek and your the seeker, that is what I think the killer feels like, I have no complaints I like all three killers, some more than others but thats me. My favorite is the Hillbilly. 

Playing as survivor : I like it, i'm not good at it. I always get caught, but that is part of the game. It still has its rewarding moments when you escape with the killer right behind you.

looks of the game:
It is not the most beautiful game to look at, but it is a horror game that is suppose to be creepy, I think that its dull looks make it more creepy so it works out, plus it gives gamers with smaller PCs the chance to play.

So overall I like the game, I feel anybody that likes to get scared or be the scarer will like this game. It has a few bugs, but what games doesn't, if you want a bug free game, then wait. Hopefully issues will be fixed and players will become genuine gamers that want to make the game better too.

So I hope this review helped you out, and cut right to the point.

2018 Update!

The game now has fully functioning Survive with Friends which is primarily why it's now a thumbs up!! Woot!.. unfortunately it is way more fun and much eaiser to play killer so that is primarily what I find myself doing.. 

I think balance is a hard puzzle to crack for most asymmetrical games and Dead By Daylight is no exception. HOWEVER, the good news is the gameplay is still really fun and causes some legitimate jump scares (Hag) and some slow burn creeping up on you thriller suspense (Michael Myers) mixed with fairly simple survivor mechanics, that keep it fun. The killer has a whole bag of tricks that make it so that even if you are against survivors that can run for days and flashlight with the best of them you can figure something out and you get way more blood points as killer so you never really feel like you lost. Unless you read post game chat that is, this may be the most toxic community NA.

Depending on which side of the current balance changes you are on gameplay just requires a bit more skill but I would still recommend it either way.

This game will get your heart pounding. The mechanics make for very enjoyable gameplay and the atmosphere will have you wanting to look over your shoulder. When playing as the killer, it can still become very intense while searching for that last survivor before they escape. Well worth the purchase.

After playing 20 something matches as the killer I only reached rank 18 despite frequently wiping out the survivors. I realised that the wraith can get plenty of points if he works with the survivors, I showed them where the generators were and they pulled down a bunch of barricades for me. End result: Disgracefull defeat in 18 matches and I am now rank 13 as the killer. 10/10, would not kill people again.

+ после того как поиграл в эту игру сразу вспомнился  мультиплеер L4D2 (создается ощущение что где-то...сейчас...вот вот.... появится Курильщик или Толстяк). Очень много переняли оттуда и как мне кажется это ничуть не портит игру. 
+ неплохая система прокачки - индивидуальные и общие перки, подношения и недурная (для игр такого жанра) костомизация.
+ имеется выбор персонажей как со стороны защиты (выжившие, убегают от маньяков, лутаются, пытаются сбежать с карты), так и нападения (маньяки вышедшие прямиком из очеча Чекотилы).
- достаточно количество багов (как впринципе и в любой мультиплеерной игре на старте).
- нельзя создать лобби с друзьями приходится искать методом: давай насчет 1. 2. 3.

В общем советую всем кто любит атмосферные стэлс хороры на выживание с элементами забавных багов и недоработок которые как мне кажется со  временем станут частью и фишками игр:D

not left beta yet

I'm really loving this game. At first I think it's easy to think that it's very unbalanced and even though there can be some improvements with some obvious exploits (such as window hop looping) over-all I feel like the balance is quite good. You're going to be pretty useless as  a villain or survivor until you're at least level 5. However, the game is amazing for quick-pick-up. One thing that's annoying are that many players leave the match lobby to look for friends so they'll need to fix this to punish people who constantly quit early. Overall, recommend!
